data.name: The mystery of the planet venus
data.detailed_description:
22nd century. Almost all fossil energy resources such as oil, gas, coal, uranium ore on Earth have run out.
And a war for resources began between the United American Continents and Eurasia.
Humanity has begun searching for resources on nearby planets. This is a story about one of such space - geological expeditions.
Peculiarities:
Single player first person adventure game.
Transport for moving around the planet.
Possibility to conduct geological exploration.
Incredibly spectacular views of the planet Venus.
Fantastic plot: your choice will determine the end of the story.
A breathtaking mystery.
Secrets and discoveries behind every rock.

data.short_description: The Mystery of the planet Venus — is a single player first-person adventure game set on the planet Venus.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1030 or higher with 2GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
